glosses: to abandon, give up, let up, stop doing something, not do something (+ ablative)

examples.translation: it'd be good if you gave up on running.

glosses: to not do something, to decide against something, to forget something (+ ablative)

examples.translation: forget that stupid plan of yours already.
she gave up on her dreams after the accident.

examples.text: Oğlu Gulam Hüseyın ve eski mesai arkadaşlarının bir saat süren ricalarından sonra eski Başbakan Dr. Musaddık dün gece açlık grevinden vazgeçerek pilâv, sebze ve haşlanmış tavuktan mürekkep bir akşam yemeği yemiştir.
examples.translation: After an hour-long plea from his son Ghulam Hussein and former colleagues, former Prime Minister Dr. Mosaddegh gave up his hunger strike and ate a dinner of rice, vegetables and boiled chicken last night.

etymology: Inherited from Ottoman Turkish واز گچمك (vaz geçmek). Partial calque of Persian باز آمدن (bâz âmadan). Cognate with Kazakh баз кешу (baz keşu).
